se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.api

Class NetworkAlgorithms

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.algorithms.api.NetworkAlgorithms

  • public final class NetworkAlgorithms
extends Object

    Collection of network-related algorithms. The address definitions are :

    IP Protocol Link-Local address range Loopback addresses
    IPv4 169.254.0.1 -- 169.254.255.254 127.0.0.0/8, typically 127.0.0.1
    IPv6 fe80::/10, but for compliance reasons fe80::/64 ::1
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB
    See Also:
    Wikipedia: Link-local address definition, Wikipedia: Loopback address definition

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function<InetAddress,Set<String>> GET_ALL_ADRESSES
      Converts the InetAddress to a Set containing all String forms of the InetAddress, namely: InetAddress.getCanonicalHostName() InetAddress.getHostAddress() InetAddress.getHostName()
      static Function<NetworkInterface,SortedSet<InetAddress>> GET_INETADDRESSES
      Finds all non-broadcast InetAddresses from the supplied NetworkInterface.
      static Comparator<InetAddress> INETADDRESS_COMPARATOR
      Comparator for InetAddress objects; failsafe in the sense that it will convert null values (on either side of the comparison) to empty strings before comparing the objects.
      static Predicate<InetAddress> IPV4_FILTER
      Predicate identifying non-null IPv4 InetAddresses.
      static Predicate<InetAddress> IPV6_FILTER
      Predicate identifying non-null IPv6 InetAddresses.
      static Predicate<InetAddress> LOOPBACK_FILTER
      Predicate identifying non-null LoopBackAddresses.
      static Comparator<NetworkInterface> NETWORK_INTERFACE_COMPARATOR
      Compares NetworkInterface objects by their NetworkInterface.toString() value.
      static Predicate<InetAddress> PUBLIC_IPV4_FILTER
      Predicate identifying non-null IPv4 InetAddress objects that are neither LinkLocal nor Loopback addresses.

    • Field Detail

      • IPV4_FILTER

        public static final Predicate<InetAddress> IPV4_FILTER
        Predicate identifying non-null IPv4 InetAddresses.

      • IPV6_FILTER

        public static final Predicate<InetAddress> IPV6_FILTER
        Predicate identifying non-null IPv6 InetAddresses.

      • LOOPBACK_FILTER

        public static final Predicate<InetAddress> LOOPBACK_FILTER
        Predicate identifying non-null LoopBackAddresses.

      • PUBLIC_IPV4_FILTER

        public static final Predicate<InetAddress> PUBLIC_IPV4_FILTER

        Predicate identifying non-null IPv4 InetAddress objects that are neither LinkLocal nor Loopback addresses.

      • INETADDRESS_COMPARATOR

        public static final Comparator<InetAddress> INETADDRESS_COMPARATOR
        Comparator for InetAddress objects; failsafe in the sense that it will convert null values (on either side of the comparison) to empty strings before comparing the objects. It is, therefore, recommended to use this Comparator only after filtering an InetAddress collection for null objects.

      • NETWORK_INTERFACE_COMPARATOR

        public static final Comparator<NetworkInterface> NETWORK_INTERFACE_COMPARATOR
        Compares NetworkInterface objects by their NetworkInterface.toString() value. This Comparator is failsafe in the sense that it converts null values (on either side of the comparison) to empty strings before comparing the objects. It is, therefore, recommended to use this Comparator only after removing null objects from the respective source Collection.

      • GET_INETADDRESSES

        public static final Function<NetworkInterface,SortedSet<InetAddress>> GET_INETADDRESSES
        Finds all non-broadcast InetAddresses from the supplied NetworkInterface.

      • GET_ALL_ADRESSES

        public static final Function<InetAddress,Set<String>> GET_ALL_ADRESSES

        Converts the InetAddress to a Set containing all String forms of the InetAddress, namely:

        1. InetAddress.getCanonicalHostName()
        2. InetAddress.getHostAddress()
        3. InetAddress.getHostName()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllNetworkInterfaces

        @NotNull
public static SortedSet<NetworkInterface> getAllNetworkInterfaces(Comparator<NetworkInterface> ifComparator)
                                                                    throws IllegalStateException
        Retrieves a SortedSet containing all NetworkInterfaces found.
        Parameters:
        ifComparator - A Comparator ordering the NetworkInterfaces found on the executing computer. If a null value is retrieved, NETWORK_INTERFACE_COMPARATOR is used.
        Returns:
        A SortedSet containing the NetworkInterfaces on the executing computer.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces() method fails.

      • getAllLocalNetworkAddresses

        @NotNull
public static SortedSet<String> getAllLocalNetworkAddresses(Predicate<InetAddress> addressFilter,
                                                                     Function<InetAddress,Set<String>> addressMapper)
        Retrieves a set of string representations of the local NetworkInterfaces found.
        Parameters:
        addressFilter - A filter applied to each NetworkInterface found. If a null value is retrieved, IPV4_FILTER is used.
        addressMapper - A Function applied to all InetAddress objects filtered by the addressFilter. If a null value is retrieved, GET_ALL_ADRESSES is used.
        Returns:
        A SortedSet containing all String representations of the local NetworkInterfaces found.

      • getPublicIPv4Addresses

        @NotNull
public static SortedSet<Inet4Address> getPublicIPv4Addresses()
        Convenience method to find all public (i.e. non-loopback, non-linklocal) IPv4 addresses.
        Returns:
        A sorted set holding all Inet4Address objects which are neither loopback nor link-local for all network interfaces on the local computer.
        See Also:
        INETADDRESS_COMPARATOR, GET_INETADDRESSES, PUBLIC_IPV4_FILTER
